title: bike_ownership
description: Relationship linking customer profiles to owned bikes

ownership_type.title: Ownership Type
ownership_type.description: Type of ownership relationship (owner, shared, rental, test)

purchase_channel.title: Purchase Channel
purchase_channel.description: Channel through which bike was acquired (online, retail_store, dealer, second_hand, gift)

registration_date.title: Registration Date
registration_date.description: Timestamp when relationship was registered in system (ISO 8601 format)

dealer_id.title: Dealer ID
dealer_id.description: Identifier of dealer who sold the bike (if applicable)

is_primary_rider.title: Is Primary Rider
is_primary_rider.description: Whether this person is the primary rider of this bike
